recipesJson.name: Blueberry Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: RdaJunkie
recipesJson.description: Let it sit five days or so. S&V is cool but it really pulls together with a little time. Enjoy ✌️️

reviews.text: I can't wait to try this. Have you tried using a little cheesecake graham crust? .2% Blueberry MF in this is going to be dank. I really recommend that flavor, well worth the money.
